tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (SBAR (IN If) (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NN life)) (VP (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (RB ever)) (VP (VBG lacking) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN joy))))) (, ,) (VP (VBP play) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT a) (NN child)))) (CC and) (VP (VB view) (NP (DT the) (NN world)) (PP (IN through) (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS eyes))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [lacking/VBG mark>If/IN nsubj>[life/NN nmod:poss>your/PRP$] aux>is/VBZ advmod>ever/RB nmod:in>[joy/NN case>in/IN] punct>,/, conj:and>[play/VBP nsubj>life/NN nmod:with>[child/NN case>with/IN det>a/DT]] cc>and/CC conj:and>[view/VB nsubj>life/NN dobj>[world/NN det>the/DT] nmod:through>[eyes/NNS case>through/IN nmod:poss>their/PRP$]]]
